scripts.start: npm run build && DEBUG=${DEBUG:='*mediasoup* *INFO* *WARN* *ERROR*'} INTERACTIVE=${INTERACTIVE:='true'} node dist/server.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && touch dist/tmp && find dist/* -maxdepth 0 ! -name public -exec rm -rf {} \; && tsc && ln -s ../certs dist/certs && chmod 755 dist/server.js && ( for fileExt in yaml json toml ; do [ -f config/config.$fileExt ] && cp config/config.$fileExt dist/config/; done ) | true && touch 'dist/ __AUTO_GENERATED_CONTENT_REFRESHED_AFTER_REBUILDING!__ '
